title: Blender

sections.heading: HOW TO PLAY
sections.body:
• Connect a wired or wireless switch and a blender to an appliance controller.
• Use the settings on the appliance controller to activate the blender for 5 seconds (timed setting).
• Prompt the switch user to press the switch to make sure their smoothie or soup is blended properly, this may take a few presses to complete!

tooltipText: Use an appliance controller to turn on a blender and make a smoothie
